forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and damp with rain this morning...then becoming partly cloudy. High 8C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain ending this morning. Breaks of sun in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low around 35F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 12C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
